description: A 'from' reference to a resource shall be defined as a from resource reference.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: mapsTo
contents.description: The resource network connection property(s) derived from this resource network connection type property supporting its parent object. Only applied, if navigation is required.

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The nested resource network connection type properties of this network connection type property.

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
